name: Notice.AAA6.CP.HearingFee.HWF.FullRemission
titleEn: Your help with fees application has been approved
titleCy: Mae eich cais am help gyda ffioedd wedi'i gymeradwyo
descriptionEn: The full hearing fee of ${hearingFee} will be covered by fee remission. You do not need to make a payment.
descriptionCy: Telir ffi lawn y gwrandawiad o ${hearingFee}. Nid oes angen i chi wneud taliad.
